sentence.Network_en: The world of the gods is anthropomorphic, an imitative projection of ours.
sentence.Network_cn: 神界是拟人化的，是模仿我们人类世界的一个投影。

sentence.Network_en: Groups like ours are committed to eradicating homophobia, racism and sexism.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些像我们这样的团体致力于消除对同性恋的憎恶、种族歧视和性别歧视。

sentence.Network_en: I can't really tell the difference between their policies and ours.
sentence.Network_cn: 我真的看不出他们的政策和我们的有什么不同。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 都市改革组织(OURs)专案执行施媖之表示，区内有三个老埤塘，是许多水鸟的栖息地，不仅是都市之肺可调节为气候，更是基隆河河 …

洪恩英语1-4级词汇 - 豆丁网 ... its 它的东西 ours 我们的东西 theirs 他们/她们的 36.
victory is sure to be ours ., 胜利一定属于我们的.

list.abs: They were not allowed to fish in our territorial waters ., 不允许他们在我国领海捕鱼.
the custom has come down in our area for two centuries ., 这种风俗在本地区流传有两个世纪了.

I am very saddened for our people and the local community that we had to come to this decision but we have acted in order to match our machine capacity to the paper volumes demanded by our customers .我非常难过，为我国人民和当地社区，我们来此决定，但我们已经采取行动，以配合我们的机器的能力，该文件所要求的数量
influences of the contemporary western philosophy on our society ., 现代西方哲学思潮对我国社会的影响.
you dreamed of all our children ., 你梦到我们所有的孩子.

entry.def: You use ours to refer to something that belongs or relates both to yourself and to one or more other people.

example.ex: Japanese democracy is certainly different from ours...
example.tran: 日本的民主制度无疑与我们的不同。

example.ex: There are few strangers in a town like ours...
example.tran: 像我们这样的镇子很少有外地人。

auth_sentence.content: Theirs is a moving target, ours is still.
auth_sentence.res_content: Theirs is a moving target, ours is still.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Theirs is a moving target, ours is still.

auth_sentence.content: Ours is innate due to our own evolutionary legacy.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ours is innate due to our own evolutionary legacy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ours is innate due to our own evolutionary legacy.

auth_sentence.content: The question tonight is whether we'll meet ours.
auth_sentence.res_content: The question tonight is whether we'll meet ours.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The question tonight is whether we'll meet ours.

sentences.en: Their children study hard while ours never study.
sentences.cn: 他们的孩子学习很刻苦, 而我们的孩子从来不学习。

sentences.en: Let's clean their room first and then ours.
sentences.cn: 咱们先打扫他们的房间, 再打扫我们的房间。

jushi.english: Let's clean their room first and then ours.
jushi.chinese: 咱们先打扫他们的房间,再打扫我们的房间。

jushi.english: Their house is similar to ours.
jushi.chinese: 他们房子和我们的差不多。

jushi.chinese: 他们的孩子学习很刻苦,而我们的孩子从来不学习。
